friendFirst: When ye first set 'o submissions be deployed, ye gunna receive th' HabitRPG Contributor's medal. ye moniker in Pub chat gunna proudly display that ye be a contributor. As a bounty fer ye work, ye gunna also receive 2 Gems.
friendSecond: When ye second set 'o submissions be deployed, th' Crystal Armor gunna be available fer purchase in th' Rewards shop. As a bounty fer ye continued work, ye gunna also receive 2 Gems.
eliteThird: When ye third set 'o submissions be deployed, th' Crystal Helmet gunna be available fer purchase in th' Rewards shop. As a bounty fer ye continued work, ye gunna also receive 2 Gems.
eliteFourth: When ye fourth set 'o submissions be deployed, th' Crystal Sword gunna be available fer purchase in th' Rewards shop. As a bounty fer ye continued work, ye gunna also receive 2 Gems.
championFifth: When ye fifth set 'o submissions be deployed, th' Crystal Shield gunna be available fer purchase in th' Rewards shop. As a bounty fer ye continued work, ye gunna also receive 2 Gems.
championSixth: When ye sixth set 'o submissions be deployed, ye gunna receive a Hydra Pet. ye gunna also receive 2 Gems.
legSeventh: When ye seventh set 'o submissions be deployed, ye gunna receive 2 Gems 'n become a member 'o th' honored Contributor's Alliance 'n be privy to th' behind-th'-scenes details 'o HabitRPG! Further contributions do not increase ye level, but ye may continue to earn Gem bounties 'n titles.
guardianText: Moderators were selected carefully from high level contributors, so please give them your respect and listen to their suggestions.
heroicText: Th' Captain level contains HabitRPG privateers 'n privateer-level contributors. If ye have 'tis title, ye were appointed to it (or hired!).
npcText: NPCs backed HabitRPG's Kickstarter at th' highest rank. ye can find their avatarrs watchin' over site features!
contribModal: <%= name %> ye person full o' awe! ye're now a level <%= level %> contributor fer helpin' HabitRPG. spy wit' ye eye
contribLink: what treasure ya earned fer yer contribution!
contribText: Has contributed to HabitRPG (code, design, pixel art, legal advice, docs, etc). Want 'tis medal?
helpedText1: Helped HabitRPG grow by filling out
contribHallText: 1-7 for normal contributors, 8 for moderators, 9 for staff. This determines which items, pets, and mounts are available. Also determines name-tag coloring. Tiers 8 and 9 are automatically given admin status.
title: Title
notGems: be in USD, not in Gems. Aka, if 'tis number be 1, it means 4 gems. Only use 'tis option when manually grantin' gems to players, don't use it when grantin' contributor levels. Contrib levels gunna automatically add 2G/lvl.
conLearnHow: Learn how t' contribute t' HabitRPG
whyAdsContent1: Habit be an open source project, 'n can use all th' help it can get - consider 'tis a donation to th' contributors. ye also get 20 Gems from th' purchase, which ye can use to buy special items.
